name: Jurassic Dino Island 3D
description:
You flew by on the plane, when something terrible happened. You got into a plane crash and found yourself on an unknown island.
Your main goal - to survive on a desert island.
Collect items, cut the tree, get ores for open new recipes.
Use different kinds of tools for create you own house.
Beware big dinosaurs!
Start exploration island now!

Jurassic Dino Island Survival 3D game features
► new exploration 3d game
► dinosaur hunt simulator
► classic build and craft game
► Try to find secrets on island
► You must to survive - do everything for this
